dct_title_s: Terra Sancta sive promissionis, olim Palestina
dct_description_sm: edita per Fredericum de Wit ; gedruckt tot Amsterdam by Frederick de Wit.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Milliaria germanica communia" and "Milliaria unius horae".
Features illustrations of ships, a whale, and a compass rose. Illustrations of men and altars surrounding inset map.
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Decorative cartouche with illustrations of a wreath and cherubs.
Descriptive text below inset map: Castrorum populi Israelitiei prout secundum Dei ordinationem...
